subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Fifty-two points separated the Celtics from the Knicks at one point Thursday, and it was hard to say whether the biggest gap was on the scoreboard, or between Coach Isiah Thomas and his players.
snippet: Fifty-two points separated the Celtics from the Knicks at one point Thursday, and it was hard to say whether the biggest gap was on the scoreboard, or between Coach Isiah Thomas and his players.
